column1: #Text=Main Aang Appa Momo Katara Sokka Suki Toph Zuko says : " Minor Bumi Iroh Jeong Jeong June Kuruk Kyoshi Lion turtle Nyla Ozai Pakku Piandao Roku Yangchen " Aang says : " What happened ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , good to see you back with the living , buddy !
#Text=" Toph says : " Uh-oh , somebody catch him , he 's going to - " Mai says : " Are n't you cold ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 've got a lot on my mind .
#Text=It 's been so long , over three years since I was home .
#Text=" Mai says : " I just asked if you were cold , I did n't ask for your whole life story .
#Text=" Aang says : " Why are we on a Fire Nation ship ?
#Text=And why am I the only one who 's completely out of it ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You need to take it easy , okay ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " I 'm Hakoda , Katara and Sokka 's father .
#Text=" Katara says : " He knows who you are .
#Text=I just called you " Dad " , did n't I ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " I guess you 're right .
#Text=" Aang says : " Nice to officially meet you , Chief Hakoda .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " It 's an honor to meet you .
#Text=" Katara says : " Great , great , so now you guys have finally met .
#Text=So would you mind giving us a little privacy ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Are you mad at your dad or something ?
#Text=" Katara says : " What , not at all .
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe we should go upstairs .
#Text=" Katara says : " Tell me where the pain feels most intense .
#Text=" Aang says : " Mmm , a little higher .
#Text=" Aang says : " Wow , you 're definitely in the right area there .
#Text=" Katara says : " I can feel a lot of energy twisted up around there .
#Text=Let me just see if I can - "
